That's the whole purpose of this sub-section. You got to any company and post what you want... theres no need for a sticky since that's why this section is here in the first place.

I thinks it missing a sticky thread were every body can ask for what they need!

After the offer is respond the company witch have made the craft can send the link to here company and the craft they have made.

Also if you want a craft don't expect much in the way of mods used as most companies are stock.
